Package com.flamingOctoIronman.core.event

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CoreEvent
    This class is an abstract implementation of Event.
    CoreEventBusService
    This EventBusService is for the engine's CoreEvents.
    GameLoopEvent
    This CoreEvent is published whenever there is a tick.
    InitializationEvent
    This CoreEvent is published during the initialization part of the game's life.
    PostInitializationEvent
    This CoreEvent is published during the post-initialization part of the game's life.
    ShutDownEvent
    This CoreEvent is published during the shutdown part of the game's life.
    StartUpEvent
    This CoreEvent is published during the startup part of the game's life.
  • Annotation Types Summary 
    Annotation Type Description
    CoreEventHandler
    This annotation is to mark methods with the CoreEvent they subscribe to.
